Answers Email Templates Configuration
</emphasis>
</citetitle>
</para>
{docbook}

Answers is configured mainly in the _/webapps/faq/WEB-INF/portlet.xml_ file.

{info}
For general information of the Knowledge configuration, refer to [Knowledge Configuration|#KSref.Configuration] section.
{info}


*Configuration*


The Mail templates use a specific syntax, enabling you to create a customized email message in the Edit mode via three templates: New question, Edit/answer, and Move question. 

!images/EmailTemplate.png|align="center" width="120mm" fo:scalefit="1" html:scalefit="0"!

Parameters which are used in templates consist of:

|| Parameter || Description ||
| *&categoryName\_* | Load the name of Category. |
| *&questionContent\_* | Load the question's content. |
| *&questionResponse\_* | Load the question's answer. |
| *&questionLink\_*| Load the link to question in the Answers portlet. |
